title: WTB T206 Walsh Raw or Graded

posts.post_title: WTB T206 Walsh Raw or Graded
posts.post_content:
Hello Net54ers,

If you might be interested in parting with your Walsh please let me know. I’m only interested in Old Mill and Sweet Caporal 150/25 or 350/25 subject reverses. Thanks!
